I loved this game so much. the attention to detail is superb and the use of soundtrack is fantastic. This is honestly one of the funiest and well-polished game i've ever played. I've heard talk of people wanting a Portal 3 but In my opinion this game ties up all the loose ends from the first game pretty well.
You will not regret buying this game! You can play solo or multiplayer and you'll have lots of laughs!
Great story and fun cooperative mode.  I would definetely recommend to anyone as it's definetely a game you will spend time on.

玩就对了

This game is just honestly amazing.
The puzzles are just enough to be not easy but not hard either. Add new concepts perfectly and different ways to do something. Sometimes you have to think outside the box and I really adored that. 

The story, it's honestly amazing. I love how they entitled killing glados in the previous game into this one. I love how there's more than just a puzzle it actually has a story to brought along while completing a new chamber. 

Online is really cute, (I won't spoil the characters but THERES A BLUE AND YELLOW ONE) I love working together especially coming from singeplayer. I usually end up having those funny laughs, trolling people and just having a great time.
The game looks really polished from the previous game and I'm glad to see a sequel to this. 

Overall I really think this game deserves the "Better with Friends" Steam Award 2018 
I hope to see this game win future rewards, even though this game isn't as popular anymore. It's still an award in my heart

Her defasında kendi atmosferine çekmeyi başaran başarılı ve nadir oyunlardan biri. Ne de olsa Valve ait bir eser. Başarılı bir harita yapmak konusunda yeteneğimi de bu oyuna borçluyum diyebilirim. Sanırım bu oyun yani bu sanat şaheseri ömrümün sonuna kadar benim listemde bulunacak. Çünkü bu sevmenin bir tık ötesi gibi. Teşekkürler Valve.

Absolutely love this game to pieces.
My favorite strategy/puzzle game out of all the others.
Especially because it's story rich and majorly connected to the Half-Life franchise (also a great franchise I recommend you check out if you haven't already.)

Simplemente un juegazo, un clásico de los rompecabezas con unas mecánicas que para la época eran muy innovadoras, una historia capaz de atraparnos, corto pero con mucho apoyo de la comunidad. Por lo que cuesta en rebajas o dentro de cualquiera de los packs de Valve no puede faltar en tu biblioteca.
